1.0.name: wordpress/oneclickpublish
1.0.description:
I searched internet on publishing my multipe posts in draft and the basic procedure of wordpress is not fast . so I made a simple plugin where you can make multiple post status of post from publish to draft and draft to publish.

A menu tab OneClickPublish will appear on admin menu after installation . You will see table view of all the posts that are published and another table view which will show the list of all posts in draft .

you can click on multiple publish buttons and all the posts will be published . It is most basic form of plugin that can be made .
